memberdef.name: k_reset_interval_map
memberdef.initializer: = { {128UL, reset_interval_clock_period_mult_128}, {256UL, reset_interval_clock_period_mult_256}, {512UL, reset_interval_clock_period_mult_512}, {1UL * (1024UL) , reset_interval_clock_period_mult_1k}, {2UL * (1024UL) , reset_interval_clock_period_mult_2k}, {4UL * (1024UL) , reset_interval_clock_period_mult_4k}, {8UL * (1024UL) , reset_interval_clock_period_mult_8k}, {16UL * (1024UL) , reset_interval_clock_period_mult_16k}, {0xFFFFFFFFUL, reset_interval_out_of_range}, }
